DOC.criteria: Patients age between1865 undergoing elective abdominal hysterectomy ASA ( American Society Anesthesiologist ) I , II physical status Not agreement study , Dermatological lesion affect electrode place , Chronic preprocedural use opioids , steroid psychoactive drug , Allergy drug use trial , Previous experience TENS , Kidney , liver , neurological cardiovascular system disease Body mass index > 40
